solution_line_template: After the first week, the fee will be ${loan_amount} * {initial_fee_percent_num}% = $<<{loan_amount}*{initial_fee_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={fee_week1}>>{fee_week1}.
For the second week, the finance percentage will be {initial_fee_percent_num}% * {doubling_factor} = {fee_percent_week2_num}%.
George will have to pay a fee of ${loan_amount} * {fee_percent_week2_num}% = $<<{loan_amount}*{fee_percent_week2_num}*{percent_factor}={fee_week2}>>{fee_week2} for the second week.
In total, George will be charged ${fee_week1} + ${fee_week2} = $<<{fee_week1}+{fee_week2}={total_fees}>>{total_fees} in fees.
